metadata.synopsis: This fires during the fight with the player. The player has figured out which illusion is the real hag and hit it.

0.speaker: GROUP_Act1_GLO_HagHag
0.context: NodeContext: You're in the middle of the fight - the player has figured out which illusion is the real you and hit you. You're PISSED. Furious at the player, yelping in pain for one of them, and roaring at the player for the others. Furious, vengeful and MAD.
